title: BlackRock's Magyera: Private Market Adoption on the Rise
description:
Jaime Magyera, BlackRock Head of U.S. Wealth Advisory and Head of Retirement, says advisors should consider the role private investments play in portfolios and how they complement traditional assets. She speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.”
 (Source: Bloomberg)
